channel.title: Underwater zoom-in bug
channel.description: Whenever I enter water, the game zooms in incredibly far, making it impossible to navigate underwater. It's like the zoom with Z button multiplied by 5 and the only fix is to leave the water...

item.title: Underwater zoom-in bug
item.dc:creator: Dotard
item.description:
EDIT: I’ve managed to find the solution! If anyone ever finds themselves having a zoom-in while underwater, disable ‘image sharpening’ in Nvidia control panel, does wonders.
